citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Facility representative was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:50-11:20
am on 09/16/2014. Facility representative was reached by phone; out of town.
